job.title: Site Reliability Engineer/DevOps
job.description: pMalbek is the nextgeneration cloudbased contract management solution empowering business users to take control of their contracts The world of contract management is full of tools with clunky user interfaces costly implementations and customers that are generally underwhelmed We know it doesnt need to be this way and thats why Malbek is forging a new path From products that delight to exceptional people who make everything run smoothly Malbek stands apart as a company with both an outstanding product portfolio and a refreshing culture Check outnbspemOur Companyemnbsppage to learn more about usppnbspppWe are looking for a talented DevOps engineer to join our SRE team in the US where you will be supporting our SaaS solution running on AWSppnbspppstrongExperience and Skillsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp3 years as a Site Reliability Engineer DevOps Engineerppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp2 years AWS Experience EC2 RDS VPC IAM etcppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent scripting skills  Bash Python Go etc ideally with some coding experienceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent Linux system administration and networking skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAutomating build pipelines deployments and monitoringppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspWriting ansible playbooks for managing infrastructure or similar toolsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspDiagnosing lowlevel systems issues and tuning performanceppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent Linux system administration and networking skillsppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspGood understanding of cloud operations and deployment pipelinesppstrongnbspstrongppstrongCandidates should also be able to demonstrate the following abilitiesstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspAbility to go off and research a new technology and provide a well thought out costbenefit analysisppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExcellent communication skills collaborative and personable  happy to help take a lead on projectsnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspppnbspppstrongBenefitsstrongppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspA dynamic startup environment with a rapidly growing customer baseppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspLots of space and freedom to be yourself and take ownershipppnbspppnbspp
